m_descr:
The application allows you to manage Starline security complexes.


Available:

  • Security management (setting/removing);
  • Engine Management (Start-up/Shutdown);
  • The temperature in the cabin;
  • Engine temperature.

Login – your login to starline-online.ru

Password – the user's password on starline-online.ru

Application ID (AppID) – must be obtained in your personal account at my.starline.ru in the Developers section

Application password (AppSecret) – you need to get it in your personal account at my.starline.ru in the Developers section
h_login: User login or any of the confirmed emails
h_app_id: Application ID. You need to get on my.starline.ru
h_app_secret: Application password. You need to get on my.starline.ru
h_sms_code: Sms code, if two-factor authorization is enabled, after adding the application, you will receive an SMS, go back to the application settings and enter this code
h_captcha_code: Captcha Code - In case of incorrect login or password entry, you will need to enter a Captcha in the future, see 'Notifications'.
